titleInfo.title: Letter No. 79: Copy of a Commission Made by the Court of Directors of the East India Company to Brigadier General Lawrence Nilson

mods.abstract: This item is a copy of a commission made by the Court of Directors of the East India Company to Brigadier General Lawrence Nilson, appointing him as Commander of the Military Forces under the Presidency of Bombay. The original statement is attributed to Thomas Morton, Secretary to the Court of Directors.
